about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of MetaRides Racing, the ultimate multiplayer race game that takes the excitement of racing to new heights! In this game, vehicles are not just virtual representations, but actual Web3 digital assets that can be owned, traded, and sold. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you explore a wide variety of tracks, compete against other players, and build your racing empire.

One of the key features of MetaRides Racing is the vehicle unlocking system. Certain vehicles in the game will grant you access to specific tracks, each with its own unique challenges and environments. As you progress and unlock more vehicles, you'll have the opportunity to tackle increasingly difficult and thrilling races.

To stay ahead of the competition, MetaRides Racing offers an in-game economy that allows you to upgrade your vehicles. By investing in performance enhancements, you can optimize your vehicle's speed, handling, and other attributes, giving you a competitive edge on the track. Strategically managing your resources and making wise upgrade choices will be crucial for success.

But the excitement doesn't stop there! MetaRides Racing encourages a sense of community and competition through team racing. Gather your friends or join forces with other players to form teams, and challenge rival teams in epic race nights. The intense battles between teams will not only test your driving skills but also foster a spirit of camaraderie and rivalry as you strive for the ultimate bragging rights.

To keep you engaged and rewarded, MetaRides Racing features daily challenges that offer exciting objectives and rewards. By completing these challenges, you can earn valuable in-game currency, unlock exclusive content, or gain other perks that enhance your racing experience. Additionally, the game offers monthly and annual subscriptions that provide you with additional benefits, such as exclusive vehicles, tracks, or in-game currency.

Immerse yourself in MetaRides Racing's hyper-realistic tracks, each meticulously designed to provide an immersive and thrilling racing experience. Feel the rush as you navigate through challenging turns, avoid obstacles, and compete against skilled opponents. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and dynamic weather effects, MetaRides Racing delivers an unparalleled level of visual and gameplay immersion.

So, what are you waiting for? Choose your vehicle, select your favorite track, and get ready to rev your engines in MetaRides Racing! Experience the thrill of high-speed racing, engage with a vibrant community of players, and dominate the leaderboards. The road to victory awaits you!

ext_user_account_notice: Microsoft Playfab (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: MetaRides Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gear up for MetaRides Racing, the thrilling multiplayer race game where vehicles are digital assets! Unlock tracks with unique challenges, upgrade your rides with an in-game economy & form teams for epic race nights. Daily challenges and subscriptions. Choose your hyper-realistic track & race today!
